UI_TEXT.你好，欢迎使用ZML节点~\n此节点会筛选掉你不想要的一些tag，你可以将R18:
Hello, welcome to ZML Nodes~
This node filters out unwanted tags. You can input tags like R18 tags into the text box below. It will remove the tags from the top text box that are present in the bottom text box. For example, if the top input is '1girl,2girls,solo,' and the bottom input is 'nsfw,', the output text will be '1girl,solo'. The filtered text can also be output via the '*Filtered*' interface. If you don't need to output the filtered tags, leaving it unconnected will work fine.
Alright then! Wish you a happy life and a happy day~
UI_TEXT.输入要删除的标签或子字符串（用英文逗号分隔）: Enter tags or substrings to delete (comma-separated)
UI_TEXT.你好，欢迎使用ZML节点~\n此节点会从第一个文本中删除第二个文本中指定的标签或:
Hello, welcome to ZML Nodes~
This node deletes specific tags or substrings from the first text, as specified in the second text. For example: if the first text is '#1girl,2girls,solo,' and the second text is '2girls,#,1,o,', the output will be 'girl,sl,
'. Excessive commas will be automatically cleaned after deletion.
Wish you a happy day!
UI_TEXT.当'文件选择'为'禁用'时，此文本框生效: This text box is active when 'File Selection' is 'Disabled'
UI_TEXT.你好~欢迎使用ZML节点~本节点现在支持两种输入方式：文件或文本框。\n1. *:
Hello~ Welcome to ZML Nodes~ This node now supports two input methods: file or text box.
1. **File Mode**: Select a TXT file from the 'zml_w/txt' folder using the dropdown menu. The node will ignore the text box content and read text lines from the selected file.
2. **Text Box Mode**: Set the dropdown to 'Disabled', then you can directly input content into the text box below.

 The node supports three loading modes:
- **Index**: Loads the corresponding line according to the specified 'Index' value.
- **Sequential**: Loads the next line in sequence each time it runs. Counters are independent for different nodes and reset upon restart.
- **Random**: Randomly selects a line each time it runs.

Alright then! Wish you a happy day~

UI_TEXT.更新行计数JSON文件失败: {str(e)}: Failed to update line counter JSON file: {str(e)}

UI_TEXT.错误: 读取文件 '{文件选择}' 时发生错误: {e}: Error: An error occurred while reading file '{文件选择}': {e}
UI_TEXT.当'文件'为'禁用 (使用文本框)'时，加载此处的标签或多行文本: When 'File' is 'Disabled (Use Text Box)', load tags or multi-line text from here
UI_TEXT.你好~欢迎使用ZML节点~\n此节点会自动读取'zml_w/txt'文件夹下的t:
Hello~ Welcome to ZML Nodes~
This node automatically reads TXT files from the 'zml_w/txt' folder. Select a file from the dropdown menu, and the node will randomly pick a specified number of lines or tags, assigning each a random weight between your set minimum and maximum values (inclusive). You can also set the number of decimal places for the weights. If lines end with commas, the node will automatically remove them to ensure correct weight formatting. The node comes with a TXT file of 1000 artists, and you can add your own TXT files too.
If no TXT file is read, it will load tags from the text box and add random weights to them!
Alright then~ Have fun!
UI_TEXT.下拉菜单中未选择有效文件，请检查 '.../zml_w/txt' 目录下是否有t: No valid file selected in the dropdown menu. Please check if there are TXT files in the '.../zml_w/txt' directory and restart ComfyUI.

UI_TEXT.错误: 读取文件 '{文件}' 时发生错误: {e}: Error: An error occurred while reading file '{文件}': {e}
